name: Flooded Gardens
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This game requires Kodu to run! I'm sorry!

If you cannot play this game, or if you are interested in seeing me discuss my creative process, you could watch my developer commentary of it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WVoTt5J72tc

I made this game as the final assessment for my Introduction to Video Games unit at Macquarie University. It got very good marks, so I thought I'd let you play it!
